Bash(/tmp/rename_brian.ps1 << 'PSEOF'
$basePath = "C:\\Alpha\\UB-CIM \(non fiction Author\)\\.q-system"
Get-ChildItem -Path $basePath -Recurse | Where-Object { $_.Name -like '*Brian*' } | ForEach-Object {
